name: DeeperintoNow
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: deeper into now
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Guidance into the Present moment to go deeper into Now, the state of Being.

We will help to clean your mind with calm words for your meditation, and to motivate you. Close your eyes and listen to the words of relaxing Alexa voice

[How to use]
You can say, “Alexa, open Deeper into Now” to hear the latest stories. While listening to a story, you can say ”Alexa, stop” to stop the story. You can continue to the next story by answering “Yes” to the question “Would you like to read the next post?"

Example phrase:
"Alexa, open Deeper into Now"

[Dialogue flow]
a. The Skill will play its welcome message upon hearing the user’s command, “Alexa, open Deeper into Now."
b. The Skill will automatically play the most recent posting from the open Deeper into Now board from wecast.ai.
c.After playing the most recent post, the Skill will ask “Would you like to read the next post?”
- If the listener says “Yes”, the Skill will play the next posting
- If the listener says “No”, the Skill will exit the Skill
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
